message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I understand you want to be fair, Alice, but waiting benefits you more than me.  This offer gives us both something.
Okay Bob, I'll take a little less this time, but I still need a good portion.  Let's end this before the inflation hurts us both too much.
Alice, this is a good deal for both of us.  We're both losing money if this drags on. Let's be reasonable and end this.
